name: PixelPics
description:
PixelPics is a picture-crossword puzzle game for Windows and Linux.

Using simple logic rules you fill in squares to reveal a full-colour picture in this classic Japanese puzzle game in the of Picross.

  • 200 full-colour puzzles!
  • Download player-made puzzles
  • Create your own puzzles
  • Interactive tutorial for new players
  • Difficulty levels from beginner to expert
  • Share your creations with other players

Free 40 puzzle demo available to download!
